q: Republican 2012 presidential hopefuls to appear at the annual gathering. Michele Bachmann , a Minnesota Republican, is set to keynote the March for Life Rose Dinner Monday night. Earlier Monday, Rick Santorum tweeted, Just arrived at the March for Life on the Mall- cold but hearty mostly young folks! Well-known in socially conservative circles, Mike Pence has spoken at the march every year since 2001, when he was first sworn into Congress. Republican Mike Pence arrived at Columbus in his east-central Indiana district for a town hall meeting, the sort of event that usually attracted a few dozen constituents. Surprised to see the hallway outside the room crowded with people, their arms folded and brows furrowed, Mike Pence shouted down the hall to an aide, asking him to get a janitor to open the room. The aide shouted back that the room was open- and overflowing. Congress had just passed the stimulus(
